overview:
Norm has over a decade of experience building web applications and was most recently a Sr. Web Engineer at Adobe Systems. If you’ve ever downloaded Adobe Reader or an update to Adobe software, you’ve likely come across some of Norm’s work. Prior to Adobe, Norm also worked at Walmart.com, Gamers.com (with Dennis), NBC Internet/Snap.com, and CNET.

Norm was also a co-founder & principal architect of an online magazine that was successfully acquired in 2006.
